creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture; formerly given to the Center by William Perreault
description: low sideboard with two sliding wooden doors across front; contrasting dovetailing at edges: rectangular shapes at top edges, and classic dovetail shape at side edges; elevated on two horizontal platforms (running across width) and two vertical (running depth) platforms; inside, on each side behind sliding panel are two shallow drawers at top, with depressed area for hand, and a shelf
title: Cabinet
